title: ‘Ranaviru Mawpiya Rakawarana’ Accounts awarded for War-Hero Parents
content: Monthly allowance of Rs. 750 for each parent Ranaviru Seva Authority to spend Rs. 450 million each month 4000 parents attend inaugural ceremony at Temple Trees The inauguration ceremony of the ‘Ranaviru Mawpiya Rakawarana’ accounts was held today (18th October 2012) at Temple Trees under the patronage of His Excellency the President Mahinda Rajapaksa….
